newsitem.title: USA: Envirogen, Fluid Management in merger pact.
newsitem.headline: Envirogen, Fluid Management in merger pact.

text.p: Envirogen Inc on Tuesday said it reached an agreement to merge with Fluid Management Inc in exchange for $11 million in cash and about 4.2 million shares in stock.
In November, Envirogen signed a letter of intent to merge with Fluid.

In a related transaction, Envirogen entered into an agreement with Warburg, Pincus Ventures LP to finance the cash portion of the acquisition and supplement the working capital of the combined enterprise.
Under the terms of agreement, it said it would issue about 6.1 million shares of common stock to Warburg Pincus Ventures at an aggregate price of $16 million.
Shares in Envirogen, an environmental systems and services company specializing in industrial effluent and hazardous waste remediation, closed up 1/4 at 3-9/16 in trading on the Nasdaq.
